long_description: Light and slim, the Terry FLX Gel saddle offers great performance and gel padding to help take the edge off. Topped with a perforated leather cover, the saddle features a touch of gel padding at front and back to offer low-bulk, lightweight comfort. Manganese rails keep the weight low without compromising strength. The Terry FLX Gel has a complete cutaway running front to back for added comfort and flexibility.
short_description: Light and slim, the Terry FLX Gel saddle offers great performance and gel padding to help take the edge off.
